ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Treasure changes in Frontier Mountains
ygData.msgSnippet: We were fortunate enough to have a guide in our group, as their non-guide character obviously.  She sent in the call to get the GM to come witness the problem
ygData.messageBody:
We were fortunate enough to have a guide in our group, as their non-guide
character obviously. She sent in the call to get the GM to come witness the
problem and we did some pretty extensive tests to try to nail down the exact
problem. We were able to determine that if I logged out and came back I was
no longer on the list, but as soon as I pulsed on the enchanter I was back
on every giant in the castle. Very annoying.

Kit

-----Original Message-----
From: Big Daddy Legba [mailto:legba@...]
Sent: Friday, June 09, 2000 10:07 AM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Treasure changes in Frontier Mountains


Well thats lovely... I hope having ultra negative faction won't hurt me...

I have learned to ignore faction messages in kunark as I get them
constantly. (But its not a bug according to the Veeshan Guides).

In any case its still pretty darn annoying as I usually pull (most people
don't pull fast enough for my taste). Especially against things that run
fast, like the giants...
